annotation.description: An element to display in a JFace viewer
annotation.name: Item

annotationparameter.description: The pattern parameter the Item will represent in the viewer.
annotationparameter.name: item

annotationparameter.description: The label to describe the item. The message may refer the parameter variables between $ symbols, or their EMF features, such as in $Param1.name$.
annotationparameter.name: label

annotationparameter.description: Describes whether an item should display only as 'root' (top-level) element, only as 'child' (not root but as a child) or only as 'port' (hierarchic graph viewers) or 'always'.
annotationparameter.name: hierarchy

annotation.description: An annotation describing a containment relation between two items.
annotation.name: ContainsItem

annotationparameter.description: The pattern parameter representing the container. Must refer an EObject.
annotationparameter.name: container

annotationparameter.description: The pattern parameter referring to a contained element. Must refer to an EObject.
annotationparameter.name: item

annotation.description: Represents a custom, directed edge between GuiItems. Not supported by all viewers.
annotation.name: Edge

annotationparameter.description: The pattern parameter representing the source item of the edge. Must refer to an EObject.
annotationparameter.name: source

annotationparameter.description: The pattern parameter representing the target item of the edge. Must refer to an EObject.
annotationparameter.name: target

annotation.description: Formatting specification for Items and Edges
annotation.name: Format

annotationparameter.description: The main color definition in CSS format (#RRGGBB)
annotationparameter.name: color

annotationparameter.description: The line color setting in CSS format (#RRGGBB).
annotationparameter.name: lineColor

annotationparameter.description: The text color setting in CSS format (#RRGGBB).
annotationparameter.name: textColor

annotationparameter.description: The width of the line in pixels. Only available for Edges.
annotationparameter.name: lineWidth

annotationparameter.description: The style of the line (solid, dashed, dotted, dashdot).
annotationparameter.name: lineStyle

annotationparameter.description: The style of the line's arrow at the source end (none, standard, diamond, triangle). Only available for Edges.
annotationparameter.name: arrowSourceEnd

annotationparameter.description: The style of the line's arrow at the target end (none, standard, diamond, triangle). Only available for Edges.
annotationparameter.name: arrowTargetEnd
